name: FREE
text: Users can watch, no strings attached.

name: AVOD
text: Advertising-supported. Ads play before and/or during the video.

name: TVOD
text: Users must purchase or rent the content to watch.

name: PAY-PER-VIEW
text: Users must purchase for limited access to watch.

name: SVOD+TVOD
text: Users can subscribe to watch content within the service, or purchase/rent inBoxidual content.

name: SVOD+PPV
text: Users can subscribe for access to PPV events, or purchase access.
